title: Gender distribution of newspaper journalists in the U.S. 2017 , by publication
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of journalists on the Y-axis for 14 different Newspapers for 2 groups Female, and Male that are presented on the X-axis.
In Newspaper USA Today, Male had the highest Share of journalists 69.0 among the 2 groups and in USA Today, Female had the lowest Share of journalists 31.0.
Among all the Newspapers, Female had the highest Share of journalists in Newspaper The Philadelphia Inquirer and lowest Share of journalists in Newspaper USA Today.
Newspaper The Philadelphia Inquirer and USA Today had the biggest gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of journalists found for Female.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 14 different Newspapers on X-axis for 2 groups Female, and Male. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of journalists.
Newspaper USA Today had the maximum Share of journalists among all 2 groups, and it was for Male. The minimum Share of journalists was observed in Newspaper USA Today for Female.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of journalists on the Y-axis for 14 different Newspapers for 2 groups Female, and Male that are presented on the X-axis.
In Newspaper USA Today, Male had the highest Share of journalists 69.0 among the 2 groups and in USA Today, Female had the lowest Share of journalists 31.0.
Among all the Newspapers, Female had the highest Share of journalists in Newspaper The Philadelphia Inquirer and lowest Share of journalists in Newspaper USA Today.
Newspaper The Philadelphia Inquirer and USA Today had the biggest gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of journalists found for Female.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of journalists on the Y-axis for 14 different Newspapers for 2 groups Female, and Male that are presented on the X-axis.
In Newspaper USA Today, Male had the highest Share of journalists 69.0 among the 2 groups and in USA Today, Female had the lowest Share of journalists 31.0.
Among all the Newspapers, Female had the highest Share of journalists in Newspaper The Philadelphia Inquirer and lowest Share of journalists in Newspaper USA Today.
There is a gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of journalists found for Female in Newspaper The Philadelphia Inquirer and USA Today.
Among all 2 groups, Female had the gap of 17.0 between the maximum and minimum Share of journalists observed in Newspaper The Philadelphia Inquirer and USA Today respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups Female, and Male, the Newspaper The Philadelphia Inquirer is the maximum Share of journalists and USA Today is the minimum Share of journalists.
